response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly enhance your business operations and drive substantial growth. This exceptional opportunity is valued at $1,500,000, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and long-term benefits it can bring to your company.

Considering the immense value this product offers, I am extending an exclusive invitation to you to acquire it at this competitive price. By investing in our product, you will not only secure a valuable asset but also gain a strategic advantage in your industry.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if there's any information you need to make an informed decision. I am looking forward to the possibility of partnering with you on this exciting journey.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
